title: (x) Destination/Badge Of Honour - Akzidenz Grotesk/Interface {Stephen, Nicolai}
content: Hey everyone, I dug out an old edition of Q Magazine and found several faces I'd like to know: ![Q Magazine Headers](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111130453im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22805.jpg) ![Ad](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111130453im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22806.jpg) ~Thanks
author: dancetoherpulse

comments.content:
"Badge Of Honour" is taunting me.   
   
It seems so familiar, but it's not TF Adepta, FF Kievit, FF Super Grotesk, ITC Franklin Gothic Heavy, English Grotesque, Bliss...

Aww, Akizdenz, but of course (that sure slipped ;0). Also, thanks for looking Marc, I'll be sure to check out some of those which I haven't heard of yet- and even if I can't find the exact one, I like its feel and thus surely similar ones should appeal.
I believe "Badge of Honour" is set in [Interface](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111130453/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/fonts/exclusives/interfaceleb.html?picpage=3) from Dalton Maag Ltd.

Nicely played, Nicolai!   
   
I can rest a little easier now.
